file.patch:
@@ -50,6 +50,11 @@ The <action> type attribute can be add,update,fix,remove.
       <action type="update" date="2019-08-27">
         Update tests from org.apache.felix:org.apache.felix.framework 6.0.2 to 6.0.3.
       </action>
+      <action issue="COMPRESS-492" type="fix" date="2019-08-28">
+        SevenZFile could throw NullPointerException rather than
+        IOException for certain archives. In addition it now handles
+        certain empty archives more gracefully.
+      </action>
     </release>
     <release version="1.19" date="2019-08-27"
              description="Release 1.19

message: COMPRESS-492 eliminate a bunch of potential NPEs in SevenZFile
COMPRESS-412 NullPointerException defect in ChecksumCalculatingInputStream#getValue() fixed.

Avoid NPE when running against pre-release xz's (which are by definition not 1.4)

Signed-off-by: Simon Spero <sesuncedu@gmail.com>

file.patch:
@@ -51,7 +51,7 @@ The <action> type attribute can be add,update,fix,remove.
         TarArchiveEntry wastefully allocates empty arrays.
       </action>
       <action issue="COMPRESS-353" type="update" date="2016-05-06" dev="ggregory">
-        Javadoc for BZip2CompressorInputStream.BZip2CompressorInputStream(InputStream, boolean) should refer to IOEx, not NPE.
+        Javadoc for BZip2CompressorInputStream(InputStream, boolean) should refer to IOEx, not NPE.
       </action>
     </release>
     <release version="1.11" date="2016-04-06"

message:
[COMPRESS-353] Javadoc for
BZip2CompressorInputStream.BZip2CompressorInputStream(InputStream,
boolean) should refer to IOEx, not NPE.

message:
[COMPRESS-353] Javadoc for
BZip2CompressorInputStream.BZip2CompressorInputStream(InputStream,
boolean) should refer to IOEx, not NPE.

avoid NullPointerExceptions if Date is null

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/compress/trunk@1529672 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

newer version of findbugs has detected a potential NPE

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/compress/trunk@1696471 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Don't NPE on archives of all empty files.



git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/compress/trunk@1482498 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Protect against NPE; throw more specific exception

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/compress/trunk@1482155 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

file.patch:
@@ -44,6 +44,11 @@ The <action> type attribute can be add,update,fix,remove.
   <body>
     <release version="1.6" date="not released, yet"
              description="Release 1.6">
+      <action type="fix" date="2013-04-25" issue="COMPRESS-223"
+              due-to="Jeremy Gustie">
+        TarBuffer.tryToConsumeSecondEOFRecord could throw a
+        NullPointerException
+      </action>
     </release>
     <release version="1.5" date="2013-03-14"
              description="Release 1.5">

message:
COMPRESS-223 fix NPE in TarBuffer.tryToConsumeSecondEOFRecord - patch by Jeremy Gustie

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/compress/trunk@1475758 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Add specific check for incorrect classpath, rather than relying on NPE

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/compress/trunk@1159981 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

I believe the && here should be an ||, else it will throw an NPE and allow directories to be unarchived

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/sandbox/compress/trunk@674224 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
